item.title: Calculator For Age Difference : See Combined Earning years
item.description: The topic of age difference in relationships has been debated for a long time. While some people believe that age is just a number, others argue that it can affect a relationship in various ways. In this blog, I will share what I think are the advantages and disadvantages of high age differences in a couple. Advantages: Different perspectives: When partners are of different ages, they tend to have different perspectives on life.
